main event: Many reports from Nebraska, Missouri, and Kansas of bright objects in the sky and explosions of some objects that looked like red and green flames on 17 December 1955.
interesting points: Witnesses reported many bright objects in the sky,The fireball was described as 'as bright as day',Scientists are investigating the possibility that meteors can produce audible sounds at the same time as they are seen,Previous reports suggest meteors may emit electromagnetic waves,Observations included reports of explosions and flares in the Kansas City area during the same time.
witness description: Reports from multiple states including Nebraska, Missouri, and Kansas.
